course_description: Learn the basics of C programming, including syntax, data types, and control structures.
A comprehensive course on algorithms using JavaScript, covering front-end and back-end development.
Master data analysis techniques using c++ & DSA, including pivot tables, charts, and data visualization.
Explore the fundamentals of data structures, including SEO, content marketing, and social media strategies.
An introductory course on machine learning concepts, algorithms, and applications using Python.
Learn the fundamental principles of software engineering, testing, automation, and layout techniques.
Gain essential skills in project management, including planning, AWS, CLoud computing, and monitoring of projects.
An introduction to Database, including threat analysis, risk management, and security protocols.
Learn how to problem-solving perform business analytics using R, statistical analysis, and visualization.
